website_summaries.verdict: A well-made bamboo bread slicer that produces uniform slices and has user-friendly features. The lifetime warranty is a welcome bonus.
pros: Accommodates loaves of various widths and lengths and is adjustable for cutting three slice sizes
Crumb tray is easy to remove and clean
Bamboo construction is durable and sustainable
cons: Slicer works best with 10-inch knives, and the knife that comes with it is shorter than expected

customer_reviews.title: Includes eight inch knife, not thirteen inch.
customer_reviews.text: The description says a thirteen-inch serrated knife. It's only thirteen inches if you include the handle. When you search on Amazon for an eight-inch bread knife, the results all refer to the length of the blade, not including the handle. It's clearly deceptive language.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McCarron

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite product in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I really like to bake homemade bread in all kinds of styles. My problem has always been the cutting of bread slices afterwards. They always come out crooked, and not straight and aesthetic. This product fixed this problem. You can cut your slices with maximum precision. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: chaim

customer_reviews.title: It’s Great If You Want Something Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it’s very compact and that it came with its own knife. Downside: the prongs have a little bit of a give, the bread knife it came with isn’t long enough to allow much movement needed to cut through bread and the space between the prongs is over sized. I don’t know of any knife that is that thick. Unfortunately, in one of the photos you can see where one of the rubber pieces was missing and I looked in the box to find it. It’s missing. Still not a deal breaker although the wobbling drives me insane. Overall, I’ll use it because it seems simple enough, compact and it beats busting out my deli slicer.
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: No BambooSong and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was no BambooSong brand and it just didn’t seem like that great of quality. Splintering and glue was visible. I also doubt it will stand up straight. See pictures. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Turns out that this is more trouble than it's worth
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get and use this for my homemade breads. Well, it's way more trouble than it's worth. I've tried it at least 6 times since it arrived and not once have I been able to get one slice of bread the same as any other! I do much better without it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Assembled backward
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use because the slats are configured opposite of each other. Also, one slat wasn't cut properly and is too thick on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a great idea, but it did not work for us. We make a lot of rustic bread at home with a crunchy crust. the knife is weak and bends and it is hard to cut the crust. we ended up embedded in the bamboo rather than the bread. I guess if we take the sides off it is an ok board to cut bread and collect the crumbs. but really all in all not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jude F

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - not built correctly, doesn't make cutting easier.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but has multiple problems. The assembly on one side is slightly too short, so one arm won't stay fully locked into position. Additionally, when you use it, you cut into the wood sufficiently to chafe/cut some away, which leaves wood and surface coating on the bread sometimes. If you are cutting bread with a thick crust, you either can tear it off or cut into the breadboard a bit. Finally, the distance between slices is thick enough that it's too much bread for sandwiches or even toast, unless you want very thick slices.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 usues. Its a great concept but a more stable product is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kish

customer_reviews.title: Easy as sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: This product is built well. You can’t beat the sturdiness and beauty of bamboo. The slicer is very easy to set up and to take down and store. The crumb catcher is functional and easy to empty. The bonus bread knife is very good and slices well. The only suggestion I could give is if the bread knife were one inch longer it would be really much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: minus1n

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to get a uniform slice
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love that this bread slicer folds flat for better storage, the sides lock into place when you open it, and the crumb tray is great. A long knife is included which facilitates getting an even slice of bread. Cons: The sides wobble while slicing, so one will have to hold them together, or get something (like a strong rubber band) to hold them in place.. I'm giving it 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slices are attainable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread maker, and the knife that came with it is top notch! I gave this a 4 star only because it has variable thicknesses from thin to thick. It’s just my personal preference that I wanted one size for all slices and done. As I like to cut my entire loaf then bag it. You have to slide your loaf along the slot you want for your slice of bread. Also I got one of those flexible cutting mats and cut it to fit the bottom to save from slicing up the wood. I love it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Toshia

customer_reviews.title: WOW, what a wonderful product !
customer_reviews.text: Since the Coronavirus started my wife has been making bread for our family of 5 (including 3 always hungry teen boys). Her homemade bread is healthier, tasty, cheaper and always available. The problem was inconsistent slices, which made sandwiches a challenge. This bread slicer is the answer. From the day we received it, what a joy to use. We now slice an entire loaf, bag it and are determined to continue to enjoy homemade bread. WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BREAD SLICER, And the company behind it is a breeze. ENJOY.
customer_reviews.author: dennis faneros

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for a hobbyist like myself.
customer_reviews.text: As a culinary hobbyist, I find this a useful purchase. Care does have to be taken when slicing bread, as the guides slice (Splinter) as easily as the bread. I haven’t used the knife that came with it yet because I already own more suitable knives. All in all the item does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Nice bread slicer, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like the bread slicer, also included was a bread knife and a few bags for storing your loaves. I have only used it twice, but very easy to assemble and slice. I am a little worried about creating "splinters" in the wood as I slice, but so far, so good. This is one of the more expensive bread slicers I viewed on Amazon, but seems worth the extra cost to me. I think it will last.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Simple concept that works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and to empty the crumb tray. Choose the thickness you want and it's the same thickness from top to bottom. I no longer have a loaf of bread that is at a 45 degree angle by the time the loaf is only half gone!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Mainguth

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo from slicing walls coming off
customer_reviews.text: overall a nice concept for slicing bread however the bamboo in the bread slicing walls is coming off everytime I use it. The knife that came along is good, the bread storage bags and knots, not so much. The crumb collecting tray at the bottom is the best part. Had I not have to deal with the bamboo coming off each time and separate it from my bread or to carefully use the knife everytime to avoid touching the walls, I would have added another star to my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Nidhika

customer_reviews.title: Varied thicknesses
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old bread slicer which had slots for one thickness only. Well, not all bread is created equal and we use different width slices for different recipes. I like a thicker slice for French toast, but thinner slice for sandwiches .... I checked out as many styles as I could before I ordered this one and I'm totally satisfied!!!! Thanks for making such a great product ... Jeannie Stowell
customer_reviews.author: Jean Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Love this bread slice!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a LOT of bread slicers and reviews before choosing this item. It is exactly as described. It folds compactly, but opens and closes easily. It holds the bread in place and allows me to slice it evenly. I love the options for different sizes. It cleans up very easily and the tray underneath it great for keeping all the crumbs contained. I would buy this again as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R. Lippert

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this bread slicer. Before getting this slicer, my husband would get his first taste of the fresh bread just minutes after pulling it from the oven, and the loaf was always cut crooked. Once I showed him how it was done, he to was satisfied with straight cut slices of bread. As with most wood products, clean up of bread crumbs is easy, just wipe or brush the crumbs with a dry cloth or pastry brush into the trash can. You should rarely have to wash this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L Norris

customer_reviews.title: Makes uniform slices....perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as advertised, easy to set and use. I like the way it captures the crumbs. I gave it a 4 because the bread bags and twist ties were unusable and consequently thrown out. The bags had a cellophane crinkly feel I did not like, more importantly the twist ties were to short....useless. That said, the bread cutter makes uniform slices...perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Thalmann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I do wish there were more than 3 slice guides per size.i would love to find one like this that had all one size.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Best cutting board for homemade bread!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality cutting board. It helps to cut your bread in equal thickness slices without a mess. It folds for storage. I would recommend this product to anyone who bakes his own bread.
customer_reviews.author: Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I make sourdough country loaves regularly and was tired of uneven slices and crooked end pieces. You probably know what I’m taking about if you’re here. Honestly it’s a little clunky, it could be bigger (I still cut mine in half to fit), and seems a little expensive for what it is. But after using it for a few months now, I will admit it’s very satisfying to have even slices of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Faldens

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slicer after initially trying a plastic smaller device (that was totally worthless and now sits in my garage waiting for the next sale). This slicer is heavy enough that it didn't move all over the counter when I used it, and it also has a lovely collapsable feature that made it perfect to fit above my breadbox. I like the knife that it came with and the variety of slice thicknesses as well. I enjoyed thinly sliced sandwiches to save on the calories and then splurge once in while on a good thick piece of the homemade bread. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and doesn’t make a mess with crumbs
customer_reviews.text: I got a bread maker and have been baking bread weekly during the pandemic. I bought this bamboo slicer to help slice the bread into “normal” sized slices. It’s simple and it works well. I found it especially easy with an electric knife. I like it that all the crumbs collect in the base for easy cleanup
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Harder than slicing by hand
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer was nice looking, but that’s all. The knife was not long enough to get good strokes and was very flimsy and cheap. The entire slicer moved around in the crumb catcher which made it hard to keep it straight. Finally, you can’t slice all the way through the bread since the bread sits lower than the slots to slice. It’s easier to slice by hand than to use this slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Wardell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty much self contained. It is attractive, multi functional , sturdy, easy to use and clean . It produces a nice thickness per slice and the knife is included. I'm very happy with this purchase and would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: CNA

customer_reviews.title: Interesting woodworking project but doesn't cut it as a bread slicerJust about impossible to cut a
customer_reviews.text: Just about impossible to cut even slices of my sour dough bread. Tossed it right into the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: R. Seal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bread cutter. I love that it has a bottom where the crumbs go instead of all over the place (cutting homemade bread is messy!) But this little gadget makes it less so. I also love that it came with a bread cutting knife.
customer_reviews.author: alexander d blake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, well made product.
customer_reviews.text: I found this slicing guide because I saw one that was very similar, but made of maple for twice as much. The only real difference I've seen between them is the one I bought is bamboo, which is a much more quickly renewable material. The only negative is the knife that's included. Its way to short to be used in the slicer because the tip comes out of the slot and then hits the dividers. If you're going to include a knife it needs at least 3 more inches to be useful. We already had a longer knife so this was not a big deal for us. It works very well and seems to be constructed well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have recently started making bread loaves, but I didn't like that my slices where either too thin or too thick, and not straight. It allows me to make my slices nice and even. I would recommended getting an electric knife which will also ease the process. The only thing is that It will scratch the bamboo a little. I would consider it normal wear and tear because a metal board would damage my knife and plastic would tear up everywhere. Overall, very satisfied and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for bread bakers
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bread slicer for two months and love it. I make sourdough bread 2 to 3 times a week and with this slicer I can cut even slices easily with my electric knife. Set up is a snap and the crumb catcher tray makes for easy clean up. It is attractive looking so you can leave it sitting out on your counter if you wish. I definitely would recommend this product to anyone who bakes bread.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Connors

customer_reviews.title: Use a sharp knife and make sure the bread is dry
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1. Easy to setup and store 2. Easy to clean 3. Cutting slices is a breeze 4. Cheap Cons 1. I wish the knife were longer 2. The backstop is only at one end and you can't adjust the sides, so if the bread doesn't fit the width and happens to be sandwich bread, you are going to be in a spot of trouble. No such issues with country loaf or no-knead bread. Summary: I got what I paid for, it works and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SRallapa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, great quality and it cones with knife and some bags. Overall, great product
customer_reviews.author: Gilad B.

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again and recommend for homemade bread loaves
customer_reviews.text: I finally was able to bake some bread and this was so helpful to hold bread to cut it. Just wish it had a way to hold it a little more secure. Was hard as I have smaller hands to get bread to secure tighter so it did not move while trying to cut. But as I have very small hands others may not have this issue. I do really like it though. Very functional and easy to clean. Knife provided with this set was very sharp and aerated, perfect for cuttin hot homemade bread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slice well
customer_reviews.text: Not as useful as I thought it could be. You cannot actually slice all the way down, which is a kind of a big deal when you are talking about a product in theory designed specifically for that. It’s an Ok product, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Porduct !
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo bread slicer guide box is well designed and made to last. Love the feature that allows you to fold it into a more compact size for storage. Maybe in the next revision you could design in a slot for storing the knife !
customer_reviews.author: L. Bertone

customer_reviews.title: First slice of first loaf
customer_reviews.text: I decided I wanted to be able to make my own bread. And if you bake you must slice. So, far this has worked well. I hope it will continue to stand up loaf after loaf. I think banana bread may be next in the slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Henry_B dog guy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: I really love this, such a small conveinance that makes such a difference
customer_reviews.author: DSloan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: As a new home bread baker, I had difficulties slicing my loaves. The bread was great but my slices were not so good. This slicer makes it easy to hold your bread and the side guides help you to slice the thickness that you want. The unit is well made and I like that the crumbs collect in the tray for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Dryskinner

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy homemade bread slicer!
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is so easy to use - the tray attached to it catches all the crumbs for cutting the bread. The variety of thickness options to cut the bread are a wonderful attraction. We have totally gotten into making breads at home and this slicer w/knife and tray are the Best! Everything is attached w/exception of the knife so it just flips up to cut and flips/folds to clean and store. Definitely recommend this bread slicer to anyone into baking your own breads!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Northrop

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer truly surpassed my expectations. The workmanship and the quality of the unit is so much better than the one I had before. The way it folds is especially nice for storage. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy with the bamboo slicer
customer_reviews.text: I was completely taken back it the bread slicer. This item is perfect. It is a complete package it comes with a bread knife. Extremely easy to use and A catch tray for the crumbs . This will be the perfect gift. EXTREMELY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this now on a couple of homemade loaves of bread. Once I replaced the knife they gave me with one that is about an inch longer, the slicer is much easier to use & much more consistent in the cut.
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bread slicer is as advertised. It is easy to set up and sturdy. It also offers a good range of slice thickness. Like other reviewers have mentioned, the knife that comes with it is a little short for the slicer. But I have a regular sized bread knife at home, so it all works out okay. (As an aside, although the accompanying knife is a little short, it is a decent bread knife). This is the only reason I’m not giving it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: Best bread slicer I have seen anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I love to bake and bread is my favorite but have always struggled with slicing it well. I have looked and looked for something like this but never found quite what I needed at a decent level of quality. Well, I ordered this and could not be happier. It is well designed and well built and works like a charm. I especially like the crumb catcher as it makes an excellent serving tray for freshly sliced bread! I would fully recommend this product and definitely order it again! :-)
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great for Evenly Slicing Homemade Bread, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing for slicing homemade bread. Keeps crumbs from landing all over the place too! No odors or chemical smells as I saw others note for other similar products, which is why I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: ChaoticHarmony

customer_reviews.title: The best thing for sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: I am an occasional bread maker and was tired of uneven slices. Voila! The perfect solution! This handy slicer allows you to safely cut different sized slices safely and easily. The tray catches the crumbs and folds up when not in use. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Finally I have even slices!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a neat addition to my bread making! Makes nice size slices & it’s easy to use. When I’m not using it, I keep my bagged bread in it on the counter. It doesn’t fold up, so I don’t put it away. The knife didn’t cut very well. Love the natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Different brand sent to me
customer_reviews.text: I received a “Kitchen Seven” brand instead of BambooSong. Material seemed very cheap and the slats were all the same size, so impossible to do slices in varying sizes. I returned it and put in for an exchange. Hoping I get the correct product this time, but won’t be delivered for another month. (Understandable during this time, but still wish I would have gotten the product as advertised in the first place).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Imes

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation of product
customer_reviews.text: Was presented as Bamboo Song with bread knife No knife and was Kitchen Seven. Misrepresentation of product. Would like explanation of product sent
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M. Mccormack

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Words can’t describe how much I love this product!! Not only does it work super well, but they also give you a free knife and bread bags with the purchase!! I love that it has a crumb catcher too, I never realized how much of a difference having one is, and I like that there’s different sizes I can cut the bread, 100% I live my new bread slicer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is pretty nearly perfect. It looks great, works smoothly, has options for slicing thickness, and cleans, folds and stores away seamlessly - and even came with a great bread knife. I didn't know what to expect when I went looking for a manual bread slicer that wouldn't break the budget, but now I know I have the gold standard.
customer_reviews.author: AJS23

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but pointless extras
customer_reviews.text: Works great, love the crumb catcher. Wish it didn't come with plastic bags and a crappy bread knife, as that's all just pointless waste.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one after buying a cheap knock off from a different company , that broke instantly. I decided to spend a little more and buy a well made bread slicer. I was NOT disappointed. Excellent product, easy to clean, easy to use , and folds up nice to store . Also comes with its own knife. I would definitely buy this product again. Shipping was also incredibly fast. Definitely a positive experience .
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great slicer and stores easily.
customer_reviews.text: Love my bread slicer!! I prefer it a little thinner but I just move the bread to the size I want but it folds perfectly for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline (ketomomofone)

customer_reviews.title: Bread Slicer
customer_reviews.text: We make our own bread and this item has helped us to have a great slice of bread each time we need a slice. Hold the furnished knife to one side for a thin slice or to the other side of the slot for a thicker slice. A great purchase for us!
customer_reviews.author: Philip M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The accompanying knife is a bit short. The bread slicer is terrific and we use it everyday with a knife of our own.
customer_reviews.author: MC Larson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I could never cut even slices using either my electric knife (which has a slicing guide attachment) or regular bread knife, without the loaf of bread sliding on cutting board or smashing down. Now I get even slices and can slice either thick for Texas Toast or thin sandwich bread, without smashing down the loaf. Crumb catcher is great. Very stable and super easy clean up!!!
customer_reviews.author: P Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home bakers
customer_reviews.text: As a home baker, I liked to bake my own bread. The bread slicer helps me cut straight even slices of bread for the perfect sandwiches. What I like most about this product, however is that it’s really easy to clean. I have enough dishes to clean after baking, and I don’t want to add even more to that chore. The bread slicer does as advertised, and I could not be happier with the price either. 10 out of 10 from this baker.
customer_reviews.author: Rayann M.

customer_reviews.title: Helps to make straight slices!
customer_reviews.text: I use this slicer to help make straight cuts on my homemade bread. It's relatively easy to use....just put the bread in and slice between the slats. The crumb tray helps to make cleaning easy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for slicing homemade bread.
customer_reviews.text: This product, made of bamboo, is well-made and helps us to make a nice, even slice of our homemade bread.
customer_reviews.author: ejs50

customer_reviews.title: Strong and handy
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this product. Sturdy, easy to use, different slicing options. I bake fresh bread twice a week and am delighted I have this.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Newton

customer_reviews.title: Genius product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the slicer, how it's made, how it sets up and folds down for storage, its easy to clean BUT ----I wish the "fingers" were sealed somehow to prevent my knife from shaving pieces off, I got a very minor splinter because of that but other than that this item is awesome! It goes great with my new bread maker too! 😁
customer_reviews.author: MirrK

customer_reviews.title: Top Product and Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: As we make our own bread, we’ve used our slicer regularly. Easy to clean, sturdy and easily stared flat. The spring locking slots keep the upright slicing in place and the wood resists splitters. Highly recommended item to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Well built, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built product. Very easy to use and fold for storage I love this
customer_reviews.author: mike miller

customer_reviews.title: Best bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bread slicer to everyone who bakes bread. Best investment we could have made
customer_reviews.author: Mark VII

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home made bread.
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect sandwich slices and makes thicker slices for panini's and even french toast.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, clean, take apart and store. Also like the way you can choose the thickness of slices you can cut the bread at. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Only downside is that it stops you from cutting bread all the way through. As I looked at other cutters, it seems the nature of the beast. As I use it more, it becomes easier to use and figure out. Love it 😍 n my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to slice bread
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the slicer for a couple of days and must say it is difficult to slice the bread. It’s either to thick or to thin and does not cut all the way through the bread.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my little kitchen and it works great with my gluten free bread
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice slicing guide!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The thinnest guide gives 1/2" slices which is perfect. My purchase included a nice bread knife and some large bread bags which will hold not only a normal size loaf but also larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for slicing bread evenly. And it included a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D

customer_reviews.title: The greatest thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: I’m staying at home making a lot of bread these days and this device is, well, the greatest thing since sliced bread! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: frizzle

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Bread Slicer!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how fast this came! Love how easy it was to assemble! I can fit small/short loaves or large/long loaves of bread. I was worried about the stability since I bake GF bread (it's a thicker bread for sure), but this product works PERFECTLY!! Highly recommend this particular bread slicer!! TWO THUMBS UP!!
customer_reviews.author: Magical Tattoo

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Started making my own home made bread and needed a better way to cut even slices. This slicer is loose and flimsy. When moving the knife back and forth to make a cut, the slicer moves all around. I've tried bracing the slicer with my free hand while cutting, but still makes for uneven slices of bread. Would not recommend this product to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Good value and function
customer_reviews.text: We started baking during the COVID lockdown, and realized we needed a way to slice sandwich bread evenly. Found this slicer and it's exactly what we needed. You can choose your width easily and it works quickly. It slices only one slice at a time, but that's perfectly fine for home kitchen needs.
customer_reviews.author: NC Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: I like the crumb catcher. It makes slicing bread much neater.
customer_reviews.author: JavaGirl

customer_reviews.title: This bread slicer is perfect I'm very satisfied with the quality, sturdiness and the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is perfect I'm very satisfied with the quality, sturdiness and the price.
customer_reviews.author: ALEJANDRO GUERRERO

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! Quick delivery and easy set up. Came with a serrated knife and bread bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ian henson

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not very useful. And it splinters
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have said it. It is too wide for a standard loaf-pan-size loaf. The knife is too short. And the wood easily splinters when cutting bread. I does look nice and I am sure I will find a use for the base. It just isn't very good for cutting evenly sized slices of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Works
customer_reviews.text: Can be cumbersome if you just need to get a couple of slices. Probably better to slice a whole loaf at a time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Previously I had used a plastic bread slicer which I gave away when I moved. Was going to purchase another but decided to go with a bamboo one and glad I did. Love how it folds up for storage plus has different size sections for thin or large slices of bread. Easy cleanup also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great help in sizing bread slices.
customer_reviews.text: This allows for slicing bread evenly as a result in the sturdiness of the wood guides. Unlike the earlier plastic guide that I used the guides do not give., Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a present for my wife and she loves it. It helps us slice the bread evenly and easily, on top of that it is easy to clean. The knife that came with this is beautiful and works great! It is very sturdy and we plan to use this product for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and collapses nicely. When not using as a slicer I use it to butter toast, build sandwiches, etc. use caution with the shorter guides in the middle, serrated knives can catch on the wood in you’re not careful, but it all depends on the skills of the user. We use it all the time now that we make our own sandwich bread at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great design
customer_reviews.text: Looks good enough to use on the dining table while eating. Makes slicing homemade bread very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for slicing bread, and it's nice to look at too! My only concern is about how easily the bamboo is to cut with the knife, and the shavings that might possibly end up in the bread because of that. But, so far it's okay! I like the product and will keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy function, easy storage
customer_reviews.text: We love this slicer. It stores very easily by folding up and storing all together. The guides are easy to use no matter the length of the loaf. Love the crumb catching feature also. We would definitely recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bread slicer--- it fits homemade bread and the bamboo also looks really nice on your counter top. I was having trouble slicing the last couple of slices of my sourdough bread and I can put the whole loaf on this slicer and slice each slice just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jett

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer guide works very well. It does a good job of guiding the knife. It keeps the crumbs contained in the slicer. It folds back up to a small size. The only issue is that the knife that came with it is too short. I had to use a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin C. George

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo bread slicer is great! I am able to achieve perfectly sliced bread. I love how the crumbs fall to the bottom as well which makes for easy clean up. I also love having my bread knife conveniently stored along with the bamboo slicer so I'm ready to go when my bread comes out of the oven!
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Having even slices
customer_reviews.text: I found this product very sturdy, well made and a pleasure to use. When i used my old slicer I ended up with uneven slices, wide at the bottom, not all the same size. I've been looking for a new one for awhile and I'm delighted with this product. It is a beautiful piece of wood, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it if you bake a lot of bread!
customer_reviews.text: The slicer worked exactly as I wanted. I make a lot of artisan breads and the crustier ones are tough to cut evenly. This enabled evenly sliced bread AND my normally wide loaves fit nicely. My only concerns are that the knife that it came with (which was unexpected!) could be longer and the board at the bottom takes a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Julia H

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bread slicer I have ever used! Holds firmly to slice and all crumbs fall into the tray for easy clean up. Easy to care for and looks great. The knive works really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread Slicer
customer_reviews.text: The product was great to use after I figured out how to use it. I was sure how to keep the bread from moving when cutting it then figured it out. No instructions. I know you probably don’t realize need instructions for that but I’m not all that great with things.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Asbury

customer_reviews.title: Moves around too much
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking board. However the bread moved around too much to get a nice even cut. And the slices were too fat for my tastes. (even with adjustments) Can do better just by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Supports multiple slice thicknesses
customer_reviews.text: Neat design and cost effective tool for home bread baker. Will allow multiple bread slice thicknesses. Shipped quickly and accurately described.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous-NC

product_meta.title: Kitchen Seven Bamboo Bread Slicer with Crumb Tray Bamboo Bread Cutter for Homemade Bread, Loaf Cakes, Bagels Slicer, 3 Slice Sizes, Adjustable, Compact, Foldable
product_meta.description:
Savor Your Baking with Painless Slicing

After much time, dedication, and meticulous measuring, pulling your loaf from the oven is so satisfying. At Kitchen seven, we want the experience of slicing your homemade bread to be celebratory, not frustrating.
Stop stressing about crooked cuts—admire your baking and devour lovely, even slices easily cut with Kitchen Seven’s bread slicing guide!

The Slicing Machine of Your Dreams

We craft your homemade bread cutter for your satisfaction, transforming a good slicer into a great one.



Rounded rod tops, as opposed to boxed rod tops, discourage your knife from nicking4 non-slip silicone stickers affixed to the bottom of the board keep your cutter from slidingA bamboo separator steadies your bread, keeping your fingers safely away from the knifeCrumb tray doubles as an appealing serving traySlicer’s shape and size enables the cutting of standard loaves, along with bagels, French bread, cake, and more!

Guides Your Knife Through Thick and Thin

With your bamboo bread slicer, you choose between thin, medium, or thick slices up to 5.5 in. wide. Pick your desired thickness and slide your knife through the slats, creating uniformly tiny slivers of cake or hefty hunks of baguette.

The Slicer That Slips into Drawers

It’s easy to store your cutting board because of its collapsible sides and light weight (2.4 lbs.). Your bread slicing guide for homemade bread has wings that open to 12.4 x 8.3 x 6.9 in. and fold to 12.4 x 8.3 x 2.2 in., collapsing into a convenient size for a drawer or cupboard!

A Gift That Rises To Any Occasion

Know someone who loves to bake? These bread cutters make great gifts for the novice or professional bakers in your life!

Discover the simple joy of precisely sliced homemade breads with Kitchen Seven’s bread slicer with knife. Add one to your cart today!
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL BREAD – There’s nothing like the smell of warm bread, fresh from the oven. Imagine serving that bread in picture-perfect slices that look as good as they taste. Discover the joy of perfectly cut homemade bread with Kitchen Seven’s bread slicer machine!

BAMBOO’S BOUNTIFUL BENEFITS – What’s an all-natural material that’s water resistant, eco-friendly, extremely durable, AND attractive? It’s bamboo! This grass’s strong, nick-resistant grain and naturally safe properties make it the smartest slicing guide for your homemade bread!

CATCHES CRUMBS BEFORE THEY FLY – Tired of bread crumbs scattering across the counter? Kitchen Seven’s bread slicing machine keeps crumbs contained in an easy-to-clean tray. Enjoy dinners with friends and family and let your bread slicer save you from stressful messes!

SMOOTH SLICING, SIMPLE STORING – Delight in hassle-free slicing and storing with bonus gifts from Kitchen Seven! With your bread cutting board, we also include an 9 in. serrated knife that’s perfectly sized to fit through your slicer’s slats. Plus, we give you 10 plastic bags with twist ties for loaves that stay moist for days after exiting the oven!

THE GUARANTEE YOU CRAVE – We created your bread loaf slicer with the same care and attention to detail that the most dedicated baker puts into their baking. Enjoy your bread slicer for homemade bread with confidence, knowing it’s built of quality, durable bamboo and backed by a lifetime warranty
